4137557552,https://ch.linkedin.com/jobs/view/business-intelligence-partner-at-volleyball-world-4137557552?position=6&pageNum=5&refId=M0aPy0juczttgLwyJWLLlg%3D%3D&trackingId=g0j%2F880cF9hRax0eDp9EUQ%3D%3D,Business Intelligence Partner,Volleyball World,"Lausanne, Vaud, Switzerland","Business Intelligence Partner
Volleyball World is driving growth, innovation and investment in volleyball around the globe.
Volleyball is the fourth most popular sport globally, with more than 800 million fans and high participation across the world.

We offer an open, dynamic, and challenging environment where volleyball takes centre stage. Our lakeside office is evolving into a vibrant international hub, bringing together a talented team dedicated to creating exceptional experiences for volleyball fans around the globe.

At Volleyball World, we foster an active and collaborative atmosphere where everyone is encouraged to strive for excellence and reach their full potential. Here, your work matters, and you‚Äôll be part of a team that includes some of the best in their respective fields.

We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. Our commitment to fairness and inclusivity ensures that decisions around recruitment, development, and retention are free of discrimination and promote a positive, diverse work environment.

We are actively seeking a dynamic and charismatic Business Intelligence Partner to join our team. Reporting to the Senior Finance & Business Intelligence Manager, you‚Äôll play a pivotal role in driving the organization‚Äôs growth by providing data-driven insights and business analysis to support decision-making across departments.
This is your chance to shine and make your mark in the exciting world of sport and entertainment!

Develop & Structure Business Intelligence Framework: Design and implement a comprehensive BI framework that promotes understanding of key business drivers through KPIs, market insights, and benchmarking studies.
Identify & Drive Data Utilization: Assess data needs across departments and foster a culture of data-driven decision-making throughout the organization.
Support Departmental Leadership: Collaborate with department heads to design, implement, and standardize dashboards that align with both short-term and long-term business objectives.
Analyse & Synthesize Data for Actionable Insights: Consolidate and interpret data to identify opportunities, uncover white space, and propose actionable initiatives to create business value.
Cross-Functional Support: Partner with strategic, financial, and operational teams to provide data-driven insights that inform critical decision-making processes.
Optimize Resource Allocation: Assist in the efficient allocation of financial resources by providing fact-based analysis and strategic recommendations.

Develop Business Cases for Growth: Support with insights for new projects and innovations aimed at driving growth across different markets. This involves identifying potential opportunities, gathering market insights, prioritizing initiatives, and supporting post-implementation evaluations.
Standardize Reporting Processes: Lead the effort to standardize financial and business reporting processes, ensuring consistency and accuracy across the organization.
Manage External Research Collaborations: Oversee the organization, coordination, and management of market research, ensuring that insights align with business objectives.
Proactiveness & Improvement: Build data-driven analysis for proactive thinking across the organization.
3-5 years of experience in business strategy, consulting, or data analytics roles.
Proven track record of designing and implementing business intelligence frameworks or strategic initiatives.
Advanced proficiency in Office tools (Excel, PowerPoint). Experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI) is a strong plus.
Strong analytical skills with experience in market and consumer data analysis, financial modelling, and creating business cases.
Consulting or agency experience is a plus

column2: additional languages are an advantage.

column1: Experience in the sports industry is desirable.
Swiss citizenship or possession of a valid Swiss work permit
Excellent business acumen with a strategic mindset.
Exceptional communicator with strong written, verbal, and presentation skills, comfortable engaging with C-level management.
Quick learner with a can-do attitude, self-motivated, and resilient under pressure.
Persuasive and capable of influencing decision-making across all levels of the organization.
Very well-organized, detail-oriented, and capable of thriving in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills to identify opportunities and drive actionable outcomes.
Team player with empathy and strong relationship-building skills.
Growth-oriented, open to feedback, and committed to continuous personal and professional improvement.
Interested candidates are invited to submit the following:
Curriculum Vitae (CV): Detailing your professional experience and qualifications.
Cover Letter: Explaining your motivation for applying and how your skills align with the role.
Diplomas or Certificates: Relevant academic or professional qualifications supporting your application.

Business Intelligence Partner

Volleyball World is driving growth, innovation and investment in volleyball around the globe.

Volleyball is the fourth most popular sport globally, with more than 800 million fans and high participation across the world.


Who We Are

We offer an open, dynamic, and challenging environment where volleyball takes centre stage. Our lakeside office is evolving into a vibrant international hub, bringing together a talented team dedicated to creating exceptional experiences for volleyball fans around the globe.


At Volleyball World, we foster an active and collaborative atmosphere where everyone is encouraged to strive for excellence and reach their full potential. Here, your work matters, and you‚Äôll be part of a team that includes some of the best in their respective fields.


We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. Our commitment to fairness and inclusivity ensures that decisions around recruitment, development, and retention are free of discrimination and promote a positive, diverse work environment.


We are actively seeking a dynamic and charismatic Business Intelligence Partner to join our team. Reporting to the Senior Finance &
column2:
Business Intelligence Manager, you‚Äôll play a pivotal role in driving the organization‚Äôs growth by providing data-driven insights and business analysis to support decision-making across departments.


This is your chance to shine and make your mark in the exciting world of sport and entertainment!


Responsibilities:

Develop &
column3:
Structure Business Intelligence Framework: Design and implement a comprehensive BI framework that promotes understanding of key business drivers through KPIs, market insights, and benchmarking studies.


Identify &
column4:
Drive Data Utilization: Assess data needs across departments and foster a culture of data-driven decision-making throughout the organization.


Support Departmental Leadership: Collaborate with department heads to design, implement, and standardize dashboards that align with both short-term and long-term business objectives.


Analyse &
column5:
Synthesize Data for Actionable Insights: Consolidate and interpret data to identify opportunities, uncover white space, and propose actionable initiatives to create business value.


Cross-Functional Support: Partner with strategic, financial, and operational teams to provide data-driven insights that inform critical decision-making processes.


Optimize Resource Allocation: Assist in the efficient allocation of financial resources by providing fact-based analysis and strategic recommendations.


Develop Business Cases for Growth: Support with insights for new projects and innovations aimed at driving growth across different markets. This involves identifying potential opportunities, gathering market insights, prioritizing initiatives, and supporting post-implementation evaluations.


Standardize Reporting Processes: Lead the effort to standardize financial and business reporting processes, ensuring consistency and accuracy across the organization.


Manage External Research Collaborations: Oversee the organization, coordination, and management of market research, ensuring that insights align with business objectives.


Proactiveness &
column6:
Improvement: Build data-driven analysis for proactive thinking across the organization.



Qualifications &
column7:
Experience:

  • 3-5 years of experience in business strategy, consulting, or data analytics roles.
  • Proven track record of designing and implementing business intelligence frameworks or strategic initiatives.
  • Advanced proficiency in Office tools (Excel, PowerPoint). Experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI) is a strong plus.
  • Strong analytical skills with experience in market and consumer data analysis, financial modelling, and creating business cases.
  • Consulting or agency experience is a plus
  • Proficiency in English (written and verbal)
column8:
additional languages are an advantage.
  • Experience in the sports industry is desirable.
  • Swiss citizenship or possession of a valid Swiss work permit

    • Soft skills

    • Excellent business acumen with a strategic mindset.
    • Exceptional communicator with strong written, verbal, and presentation skills, comfortable engaging with C-level management.
    • Quick learner with a can-do attitude, self-motivated, and resilient under pressure.
    • Persuasive and capable of influencing decision-making across all levels of the organization.
    • Very well-organized, detail-oriented, and capable of thriving in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
    • Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills to identify opportunities and drive actionable outcomes.
    • Team player with empathy and strong relationship-building skills.
    • Growth-oriented, open to feedback, and committed to continuous personal and professional improvement.


    Application Requirements:

    Interested candidates are invited to submit the following:

    Curriculum Vitae (CV): Detailing your professional experience and qualifications.


    Will be requested:

    Cover Letter: Explaining your motivation for applying and how your skills align with the role.

    Diplomas or Certificates: Relevant academic or professional qualifications supporting your application.

4114515440,https://ch.linkedin.com/jobs/view/online-data-analyst-at-telus-digital-4114515440?position=7&pageNum=5&refId=M0aPy0juczttgLwyJWLLlg%3D%3D&trackingId=V%2FFgTHiRPgwyExZyvW6NGA%3D%3D,Online Data Analyst,TELUS Digital,"Obwalden, Switzerland","We are hiring freelance English and German speaking Online Data Analysts for a project aimed at improving the content and quality of digital maps, which are used by millions of users globally. The job would suit someone who is detail-oriented, likes doing research and has a good knowledge of national and local geography.

This is a freelance position on a flexible schedule - you can work in your own time whenever work is available. You will be completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment, e.g., verifying and comparing data, determining the relevance and accuracy of information. You will be provided with guidelines for each task, which need to be followed. The project offers a variety of tasks, and work is paid per task.
Full Professional Proficiency in English and German
You must be living in Switzerland the last 2 consecutive years
Ability to follow guidelines and do research online using search engines, online maps and website information
You must have familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media and cultural affairs in Switzerland
Being open to work across a diverse set of Task Types (e.g. Maps, News, Audio tasks, Relevance)
Applicants must be 18 years or over.

Working on this project will require you to go through a standard recruitment process (including passing an open book assessment). This is a long-term project and your work will occasionally be subject to quality assurance checks.
Why Join the TELUS Digital Community?
Earn additional income with flexible hours to fit your lifestyle
Complimentary Well-Being package encompassing a wealth of well-being resources.
Be part of an online community

TELUS Digital partners with a diverse and vibrant community to help our customers enhance their AI and machine learning models. The work of our AI Community contributes to improving technology and the digital experiences of many people around the world. Our AI Community works in our proprietary AI training platform handling all data types (text, images, audio, video and geo) across 500+ languages and dialects. We offer flexible work-from-home opportunities for people with passion for languages. The jobs are part-time, and there is no fixed schedule. Whoever you are, wherever you come from, come join our global AI community. https://telusdigital.com
